# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e40b-102">Adición de marcas y avisos en Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e40b-103">Para establecer o editar un aviso para un evento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-104">Ir a [calendario](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-105">Seleccione el evento del que desea que se le avise y, a continuación, seleccione las flechas en la esquina superior derecha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-106">para expandirla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-107">Junto a **Recordármelo**, elija una hora de aviso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="3e40b-108">Outlook.com guarda automáticamente los cambios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e40b-109">Para acordarse de realizar un seguimiento de un mensaje, puede Agregar una marca de seguimiento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-110">Ir a [correo](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-111">En la lista de mensajes, mantenga el mouse sobre el mensaje para ver la opción de marca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-112">Seleccione el icono de marca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-113">para marcar el mensaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e40b-114">Para ver todos los mensajes marcados, seleccione la marca de verificación en la esquina inferior izquierda de la página para ir a tareas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="3e40b-115">Para obtener más información, consulte [marcar o anclar un mensaje en Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e40b-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
